Articles.Content: I've got a Logitech Extreme 3D Pro, and the axes have stopped working. The buttons all work fine in-game. Does anyone know how to fix this issue?

I've got a Logitech Extreme 3D Pro, and the axes have stopped working. The buttons all work fine in-game. Does anyone know how to fix this issue?

I used to get this. I think restarting KSP and unplugging/replugging joystick used to work so I attributed it to dodgy USB joystick support on my iMac. The axes on my 3D pro were twitchy and worn so I 'solved' it by getting a new joystick.
Have you tried going through the Windows control panel calibration routine again?

Have you tried going through the Windows control panel calibration routine again?

I've never had to do that IIRC, but I'll give it a go.

EDIT: it seems to have fixed it. Thanks!

Edited May 25, 2014 by Javster
